page.curvetext:
GPM Reference Concept
GPM Reference Concept
page.normal_text:
Precipitation Validation Sites for Error Characterization • Select/globally distributed ground validation “Supersites” (research quality radar, up looking radiometer-radar-profiler system, raingage- disdrometer network, & T-q soundings) • Dense & frequently reporting regional raingage networks

G O D D A R D S P A C E F L I G H T C E N T E R
G O D D A R D S P A C E F L I G H T C E N T E R
page.enlisting:
OBJECTIVES • Understand horizontal & vertical structure of rainfall, its macro- & micro-physical nature, & its associated latent heating • Train & calibrate retrieval algorithms for constellation radiometers Core Satellite • TRMM-like spacecraft (NASA) • H2-A rocket launch (NASDA) • Non-sun-synchronous orbit ~ 65° inclination ~407 km altitude • Dual frequency radar (JAXA) Ku-Ka Bands (13.6-35 GHz) ~ 4 km horizontal resolution ~250 m vertical resolution Precipitation Processing System • Produces global precipitation products • Products defined by GPM partners OBJECTIVES • Understand horizontal & vertical structure of rainfall, its macro- & micro-physical nature, & its associated latent heating • Train & calibrate retrieval algorithms for constellation radiometers
OBJECTIVES

OBJECTIVES • Provide sufficient global sampling to significantly reduce uncertainties in short- term rainfall accumulations • Extend scientific and societal applications • Sun-synch & non-sun- synch orbits 3-hour goal at ~90% of time 600-900 km altitudes OBJECTIVES • Provide sufficient global sampling to significantly reduce uncertainties in short- term rainfall accumulations • Extend scientific and societal applications

page.enlisting:
•Contiguous Scans (i.e. abutting head-to-toe footprints) through 37 GHz •Better protection from RFI, as a result of better alignment with RF spectrum allocations for Earth Remote Sensing •Option for Enhanced Performance Under Consideration •Measurement of light Rain and Snow using High Frequency Measurement Channels (166 GHz & 183.31 GHz) •Contiguous Scans (i.e. abutting head-to-toe footprints) through 37 GHz

page.title:
GMI Acquisition
GMI Acquisition
page.normal_text:
G O D D A R D S P A C E F L I G H T C E N T E R
G O D D A R D S P A C E F L I G H T C E N T E R
page.enlisting:
– Also available at this URL are: • GMI Requirements Document • GMI Mission Assurance Requirements • Statement of Work • Proposals were received by July 26, 2004 • Source Evaluation Board currently evaluating proposals • Selection will be announced before the end of year Key Provisions of RFP include: • Procurement of one GMI, • Option for a second GMI • Option for four high frequency channels – Two channels at 166 GHz (H&V Pol) – Two channels at 183.31 (approximately at +3 & +7-to-9) • First unit delivery 48 months after contract award – Also available at this URL are: • GMI Requirements Document • GMI Mission Assurance Requirements • Statement of Work
